results.title: Results & Transparency
results.notice_desc: Past trading results do not guarantee future profits. All figures below are for reference only and reflect my personal learning process. Trading always carries risk and you can lose your entire investment capital.
results.journal_desc: I record every trade with full details: entry, stop loss, take profit, entry reason, emotions at that time, and lessons learned. This is the most important tool helping me improve my skills.
results.stats_note: * Statistics based on 200+ trades in the last 12 months
results.explanation_p1: A 58% Win rate means out of 100 trades, I win 58 and lose 42. However, thanks to a 1:2.5 risk/reward ratio, my winning trades are much larger than losing ones. This is proof that proper risk management is more important than high win rate.
results.explanation_p2: Max drawdown -12% is the maximum loss level I accept in the account. This shows I always adhere to capital management principles and do not let emotions dictate trading decisions.
